channel.title: Baylor University's Garland School of Social Work

item.title: Garland School of Social Work participates in Invitation to Excellence at Baylor
item.description:
Garland School of Social Work participates in Invitation to Excellence at Baylor

Invitation to Excellence. That could mean many things to many people. But at Baylor University, it means showcasing the exciting academic opportunities Baylor has to offer to prospective students in a fun, hands-on problem-solving kind of way.

item.title: Is your child at risk for human trafficking recruitment? Know the signs.
item.description:
Is your child at risk for human trafficking recruitment? Know the signs.

It could begin online, where your 13-year-old son makes new “friends” while playing the latest game.
